Devilcat::

The shots scatter off of Devilcat's energy shield, but at least he 
can be seen now.  "I would have thought you'd realize the first time 
that projectile weapons are of little use against me," the warrior 
chides, bringing his blade around for three more quick slashes.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airshadow Nightstar" <airly2002@h...> 
wrote:
> Perceptor:
> 
> "So, now you're thinking to join Maximals, Kaiser?"said 
sarcastically 
> Perceptor "If you aren't why are you covering Maximal's leader?"
>
> >From: Rudra656@a...
> >Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
> >To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
> >Subject: Re: Perceptor vs Kaiser and Rodimus (Forgetting someone?)

> >
> >::Kaiser::
> >        Seeing the incoming shots he dives out of the way rolling 
back to 
> >his
> >feet between Perceptor and the retreating Maximals.  This 
fortunate roll 
> >also
> >allowed him to escape with only a minor cut to his wing from 
Devilcat's
> >blade.  Wincing he fires another volley at both of his assailants, 
> >Perceptor
> >and the invisible enemy known only by his blade. As an after 
thought he 
> >taps
> >a button on his sheaths calling his scimitars back to their 
resting places.
